plot outline: Karan and Gauri, a teenage couple decide to get married, however, on the day of marriage, Karan is arrested and presented in the court for being underage as per the marriage law in India. The judge asks Karan to apologize but he refuses. How he pleads the case, forms the crux.
title: Sobat
plot: Karan and Gauri, a teenage couple decide to get married, however, on the day of marriage, Karan is arrested and presented in the court for being underage as per the marriage law in India. The judge asks Karan to apologize but he refuses. How he pleads the case, forms the crux.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
